definition: A professional who specializes in the medical care and treatment of animals, typically domesticated ones. This term is commonly used to refer to a female practitioner in the field.

examples.english: My sister wants to become a veterinarian.

examples.german: Die Tierärztin hat eine eigene Praxis.
examples.english: The veterinarian has her own practice.

examples.german: Die Tierärztin kümmert sich um die Gesundheit der Tiere.
examples.english: The veterinarian takes care of the animals' health.

examples.german: Die Tierärztin hat viel Erfahrung mit exotischen Tieren.
examples.english: The veterinarian has a lot of experience with exotic animals.
